welcome_screen_summary_1: Support Tree Planting Organizations from all over the world and start planting trees from your phone!
welcome_scrn_1_heading:
You’re probably here
to plant some trees
welcome_scrn_2_sub_heading:
Find large scale reforestation
projects and help plant more
with few taps.
welcome_scrn_3_heading:
A Tree Counter
for your trees
welcome_scrn_3_sub_heading:
Have you ever thought
of starting your own forest
to save some trees?
welcome_scrn_4_sub_heading:
We’re serious!
100% donations go directly to
tree planting organizations
welcome_scrn_5_heading:
Keep track of
trees you plant
welcome_scrn_5_sub_heading:
Registering a tree you’ve
planted is a breeze and you can
always add details about it.
